entry.title: Rawai Hammock & Straps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flying Squirrel Outfitters
Type: hammock
Price: 54.84

  • INSANELY LIGHTWEIGHT: a featherweight champion at 11oz
  • 100% HANDMADE - Unparalleled quality, no mass factory production
  • DOUBLE BARREL POUCH DESIGN: The fastest set up, never letting it touch the ground
  • PREMIUM S HOOKS: Smooth edges so no snags or material damage
  • CARRYING STRAP & GEAR LOOP: Extremely portable, easily attach to your pack
  • WEBBING STRAPS: 1" thick set of adjustable webbing straps - kinder to trees than rope

The UltraWing was designed to trim the fat! We put this hammock to work, shredding ounces of extra weight to bring you our premiere ultra lightweight one person hammock. If you’re a weight conscious hammocker then our 11oz UltraWing design is specifically for you! Each UltraWing is meticulously handcrafted in the very homes of the creators, priding ourselves on superior quality using cottage construction techniques, and avoiding mass factory production.

The UltraWing features the same adjustable pouch functionality as its older brother, the DoubleWing. The adjustable pouch slides along the body of the hammock to create fabric tension, changing the size and shape of the hammock, giving you different ways to sway. Create a hanging chair to sit more upright in. Each hammock always comes with a set of tree friendly webbing straps - we won't sell you a hammock without a way to hang it!

Weight 11oz
Weight Capacity 350lbs
Unfolded Dimensions (L x W) 8.2ft x 5ft
Material 70D High Tenacity Nylon Taffeta
Best Use Camping, Backpacking, and anytime you just need to get off your feet
